LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_APKnife.label: AP knife
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_APKnife.description: The comparatively small blade of a knife makes it a last-resort weapon for a soldier. However, with Teseum coated blade, it can be a surprisingly lethal weapon.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_APKnife.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_APKnife.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_APCCW.label: AP CCW
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_APCCW.description: Though often overlooked as an option, those who follow the Way of the Sword know that, at close range, a sharp blade can be as deadly as any high-tech alternative, especially with a Teseum coated blade.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_APCCW.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_APCCW.tools.1.label: blade
